amendment.description: To provide for a total of $99,000,000 in COPS Hot Spots funding, as authorized in the Combat Meth Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4269 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4269 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Thune. (consideration: CR S2064-2067; text: CR S2065) To provide for a total of $99,000,000 in COPS Hot Spots funding, as authorized in the Combat Meth Act.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4269 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4269 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Thune.
